under the right light example the male

like a Christmas tree and it's not just

birds got us beat birds of prey actually
have two fo V in each eye this lets
their eyes act like cameras that have

instead
just a spot it runs across their entire

here's another demonstration look

in a couple seconds you'll probably

even though the level of light reaching

unique structure in their eyeball called
the pecten oculi which is chock-full of

tissues all of the nutrients they need
while reducing the need for blood
